metadata.name: Token Art Events Mazzoleni
metadata.description:
This is not a coin but a token. This is a one-of-a-kind brand icon that is capable of representing a living and tangible artistic bond with the communities of digital arts enthusiasts. The synergy between ItaliaNFT and Art Events by Mario Mazzoleni becomes an NFT designed to lead you to new and unexpected surprises! This is only the beginning of a new journey, which is why we give you the first NFT for free!
 REDEEM YOUR FREE NFT
